programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a beloved pastor's second wife is killed in a tragic car crash, it raises suspicions over the death of his first wife. Her death never sat easy with distinguished pathologist Dr. Wayne Ross.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In
programme.desc: An elderly woman gets arrested for domestic battery after fighting with her sister. Meanwhile in Virginia Beach, a 19-year-old boy gets extradited from Miami after missing his court date.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch break Gilber’s ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang start a secret club to prepare for the Outcast offensive.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh try sneaking into a concert but almost destroy Human-Boov relations forever; K-Trong invites Tip and Oh to a make-believe game weekend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something strange is happening in Toyland – trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh try sneaking into a concert but almost destroy Human-Boov relations forever; K-Trong invites Tip and Oh to a make-believe game weekend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something strange is happening in Toyland – trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena returns to his home town and makes vegan ice cream with musician Tesher, then swings home to get a taste of his mum's Egyptian cooking.

programme.desc: After 18 years of raising an orphaned bear named Brutus, Casey Anderson will do anything to ensure no bears have to live in a man made sanctuary. His resolve is put to the test one year when he is notified of 2 recently orphaned grizzly cubs.

programme.title: Laws Of The Lizard
programme.desc: Meet the creature that scientists believe is the key to the story of life and how it evolves: the anole.

programme.title: Islands Of Creation
programme.desc: In the jungles of a remote archipelago in the South Pacific, a biologist is attempting to do something Charles Darwin and Ernst Mayr never accomplished: catch evolution in the act of creating new species. Albert Uy is on the verge of an amazing discovery in the Solomon Islands, but there's a threat looming on the horizon.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Uncover the details behind the death of the world’s most powerful drug lord. Examine new documents, videotapes, and an interview with Escobar’s son to reveal who fired the fatal shot when Escobar went down in a hail of bullets.

programme.title: Tom Hanks: The Nomad

programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Single parents Selin and Anthony’s chemistry is palpable from the moment they lock eyes, but will Tamara’s pretentious viewpoints prove too much for her groom Brent?

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Tired of the modern dating scene and out of options, two new couples enter the experiment hoping the experts can find their match. But are they as good as they think they are?

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Another four singles meet at the altar to marry a complete stranger, and we catch up with all the couples as they venture on their honeymoons.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Italian Dream Home (S1)
programme.desc: Rachael is setting out to achieve her dream of owning a villa in Tuscany, having purchased an enormous stable with no plumbing or electricity. It's all hands on deck as construction gets underway.

programme.title: You Can't Escape Me
programme.desc: Having freed herself from her abusive spouse, an aspiring artist thinks she is safe in Seattle with a college friend - only to find herself in danger again. But time she is going to be prepared.

programme.title: Spinning Out Of Control
programme.desc: Contest winner Natalie rides her free stationary bike daily, guided by virtual instructor Leah. Soon Natalie becomes infatuated, and initiates a sinister plan to eliminate everyone else from Leah's life.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: The journey heads towards the picturesque water city of Chuncheon. Nam-gil and Sang-yoon meet a travelling doctor who works in remote villages without medical facilities and join him on his rounds.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The remaining contestants compete for the final Immunity Pin of the season. In round one, the contestants are given 60 minutes to make a dish with a sound to get the judges salivating.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: It's elimination day, with internationally renowned pastry chef Kirsten Tibballs guesting as the remaining contestants do culinary battle to make it through to the Top 5.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today’s challenge is a Mystery Box with 60 minutes on the clock to create a dish using the Perino tomatoes plus at least two fresh ingredients that The Top 5 must harvest from the Garden.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: MasterChef hits the road for an adventure in regional Victoria. First stop is All Saints Estate in the Murray Region where Declan, Theo, Rhiannon and Cath will take part in a MasterChef time auction.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Continuing on their Victorian road trip, the contestants find themselves in Cactus Country. Tonight sees a battle for for the last spot available in the forthcoming immunity challenge.

programme.title: The Face I Can't Forget
programme.desc: After waking from a car accident with total amnesia, Mia is taken home to be cared for by her loving husband and daughter. But as she recuperates, Mia has flashbacks of a second daughter.

programme.title: A Lifeguard's Obsession
programme.desc: When a lonely, awkward lifeguard saves a well-known woman from drowning, he believes he's earned a place in her life... and her heart.

programme.title: A Dangerous Affair
programme.desc: Pilates instructor Amelie begins a steamy affair with one of her clients, handsome journalist Pierce Dalton, only to find herself embroiled in a deadly love triangle.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time Scoop Hunter
programme.desc: Sawajima Yuichi travels to the Warring States Period, when three ninja receive a top-secret order to steal an enemy castle's architectural plans. Will they be able to accomplish their mission?

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Documentary 360
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Gifts of the North Furano:Part1
programme.desc: Leaving a popular Tokyo restaurant, Otsuka Kenichi and his wife Keiko relocated to Hokkaido six years ago. There, they offer enticing, unique dishes with local flavors found nowhere else.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! On the show this week: Niihama Leon (a singer who brings his powerful voice to Showa-era pop) and KiSS KiSS (a super-kawaii female idol group who debuted last year).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-3.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at bamboo: a natural material with countless applications.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Stroll around a World Heritage Site with an island kitty. Then, get your favorite saying written on a lucky rice scoop before playing with kitties in the historical town of Takehara.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: Since ancient times, this region has always been known to the Japanese as the Land of Plenty. We discover why on a 350km cycle ride exploring Oita, its mountains, sea and islands.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Entrances
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Entrances.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #3
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Padua, rumored to be one of the oldest towns in northern Italy, was founded during the Roman Times. Its picturesque medieval buildings and cobblestone streets have been carefully preserved.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: NINJA TRUTH
programme.desc: The ninja had 2 modes of operation: Innin and yonin. We'll examine them using reenactments and also recreate and test a ninja listening device known as "saotokikigane." Join us to see the results!

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Gifts are exchanged in the traditional betrothal rite. Paper cords are twisted into intricate shapes and decorate gifts.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Binod-san from Nepal works at a car sales company as a mechanic. When he doesn't understand his superior's instruction in Japanese, he hesitates to ask. He will learn how to clarify and confirm.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Judo instructor Sato Hitoe uses worn-out uniforms, or gis, to make items like tote bags; very durable, since the original material was meant to be tough. And behind it all is Sato's love for judo.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Gifts are exchanged in the traditional betrothal rite. Paper cords are twisted into intricate shapes and decorate gifts.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Binod-san from Nepal works at a car sales company as a mechanic. When he doesn't understand his superior's instruction in Japanese, he hesitates to ask. He will learn how to clarify and confirm.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Judo instructor Sato Hitoe uses worn-out uniforms, or gis, to make items like tote bags; very durable, since the original material was meant to be tough. And behind it all is Sato's love for judo.

programme.title: Going With The Flow / The Decoder
programme.desc: The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. // Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell
programme.desc: The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments
programme.desc: When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday
programme.desc: Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chicken's birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.title: Toy Trouble!
programme.desc: The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! Only Blaze and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess!

programme.title: Bean Cake? / Elote
programme.desc: Chef and Olly promise Bonzo they'll make him a lookalike bean cake to celebrate Bean Day, but their lookalike practice cakes get in the way. // Chef and Olly are planning a corn roast, but Ruby gets stuck at the top of a tall corn stalk.

programme.title: The Sharkdog Scoop
programme.desc: When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: The Party Animal
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Working Like a Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Ice Ice Vola
programme.desc: Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day.

programme.title: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway
programme.desc: When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk! // When Farmer Zoe's animals need some relaxation, the pups build a perfect place to practice yoga with Coach Karima.

programme.title: The Powercut
programme.desc: One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa’s house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Rongisõit
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Talent Day
programme.desc: It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Trip to the Moon
programme.desc: Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: A Very Busy Afternoon
programme.desc: Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Chili & Cornbread / Layer Cake
programme.desc: Chef entrusts Olly with his super-special cornbread pan. But things go terribly wrong when she dents it. // Chef and Olly set out to make a cake that breaks the record for most layers ever, but quickly realize how hard it is to make a cake that size.

programme.title: Rainbow Salad
programme.desc: Chef and Olly have their hands full babysitting twelve ladybug babies and trying to make them a snack at the same time.

programme.title: Sneezing Cold
programme.desc: Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call, Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles! Our heroes must race back to Axle City to bring the sick trucks the medicine oil they need.

programme.title: Lifeguard Blaze!
programme.desc: Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys
programme.desc: When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride
programme.desc: Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: Pups Save a Satellite
programme.desc: A satellite is out of orbit and falling towards Adventure Bay, the PAW patrol must fix it before it crash lands.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite
programme.desc: The Crew helps with a parking problem when Café Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder
programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift
programme.desc: Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard
programme.desc: Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Pest Friends Forever
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sleeping Like a Baby
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Ceviche for Dinner
programme.desc: When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Grandpa at the Playground
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Goldie the Fish
programme.desc: Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Fun Fair
programme.desc: The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Numbers
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Banana Bread / Starfruit Parfaits
programme.desc: When Chef learns he's going to be on the cover of a cooking magazine, he obsesses over getting the perfect pic. // At Chef's stargazing starfruit sleepover, Chef and Olly get so distracted with fun activities that their friends may miss the stars.

programme.title: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea
programme.desc: Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: Sparkle's Racing Badge
programme.desc: It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger
programme.desc: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top
programme.desc: Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: A Piñata For Mami / Invisi-Swiper
programme.desc: Dora's family makes a piñata for Mami's birthday, but it flies away! They have to get it back safe before Mami arrives. / Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket! Now Invisi-Swiper is swiping everything, and it's up to Dora and Boots to stop him.

programme.title: Living Together / Holey The Snowman
programme.desc: For the very first time, the Barbababies will take the train and sleep in a hotel. // Barbouille crafted a magnificent snowman that the children named Bobo.

programme.title: Hamsters vs. the Volcano / The Potato King
programme.desc: The hamsters venture into Harry's homemade volcano looking for the island of Num-Nuggtets, and end up at the science fair. / The Hamsters believe King Harry has been magically turned into a potato and vow to turn him back to normal at any cost.

programme.desc: Three successful Hong Kong lawyers are hired by a chemical company of questionable ethics and must eventually make a difficult decision when their employer's motives become clear.

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Blue Green Ghost
programme.desc: Based on a popular video game of the same name, six high school students are trapped in an abandoned haunted house where they are being pursued by an enigmatic blue Oni (Blue Green Ghost). After a series of terrifying incidents, are they able find a way out and finally escape from the haunted house?

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: 7ujuh

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Vic decides to run for school president, banking on his looks and his popularity. Meanwhile, Ian is so determined that Flavie should go to the school of her choice he takes control over her revision for her next exam.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Divertissement
programme.desc: Divertissement

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: In Normandy, agriculture is almost omnipresent, covering 69% of the region. It is the leading French region in terms of its agricultural surface area. A mosaic of landscapes with their varied scenery, colours and forms, shaped by agriculture and its 26,500 farms, between cereal growing lowlands, pastures and picturesque bocages.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Histoires De Chiens Suisses
programme.desc: Once used to guard the farms scattered through the Appenzell region, the Appenzeller Bläss did not have a particularly good reputation. But Dina Untersee is determined to show off their many talents: she explains how the dogs she breeds are trained and the dog shows they take part in.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Le Sens De La Famille
programme.desc: One morning, the Morels discover they have a serious problem: everyone has woken up in the body of another member of the family! And, whilst the kids discover the joys of having the body of an adult, the regression is much more difficult to live with for the parents...

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Céline are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Céline meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: Whether summer or winter, Savoie is always a land of excellence. We meet Fombonne-Rouvier, town planner; René and Maxime Meilleur, chefs at a three Michelin-starred restaurant; Klébert Silvestre, bee-keeper, Nicolas Mathieu, crozet-producer and mountain guide; Pascale Vidonne, in charge of heritage in Bourg-Saint-Maurice, notably responsible for its Baroque chapels.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Cédric Kahn, L'Échappée
programme.desc: We head off on a journey with French actor and director Cédric Kahn, a voyage to explore the settings for some of his films. From one encounter to another, he leads us towards what lies at the very heart of his cinema.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: L'Esclavage Au Cinéma, La Fin D'Un Tabou ?
programme.desc: One of the most popular mainstream art forms, the cinema offers an ideal medium to contribute to our collective memory. But, in France, few films ever represent slavery. A documentary where historians, film-directors, producers and actors try to explain the invisibility of slavery in French films.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Au Nom De Nos Ancêtres, Esclaves Et Négociants
programme.desc: Aurélie Bambuck and Axelle Balguerie share the same history: their ancestors participated in the transatlantic slave trade. One is the descendent of slaves while the other is the heiress of traders. The two women face up to their past and lay the foundations of an appeased memory. Encounter.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: Two co-workers navigate their feelings for each other through a minefield of office gossip and social media.

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: Beautiful Audrey
programme.desc: Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep3
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep4
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Enemies In-Law
programme.desc: Chul-soo, the son of notorious criminals, falls for Young-hee, a detective. To win her father's approval, he vows to pass the police exam. As their wedding approaches, his parents try to sabotage his future while Young-hee investigates a serial murder case, and Chul-soo uses his family's skills to help.

programme.title: Aespa: World Tour In Cinemas
programme.desc: Witness aespa's first world tour with futuristic stage visuals, high-energy choreography and captivating vocals. Exclusive behind-the-scenes interviews offer a glimpse behind the curtain.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A demonstration against urban renewal project leads to death of a police and a teenage boy. The boy's father, who claims he's innocent, was arrested for the cop's death.

programme.title: The Terror, Live
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: Love My Scent
programme.desc: An ordinary man who has never known love, struggles to talk to his crush who goes to work on the same bus as him every day. Things started to change when he acquires a strange perfume that has the power to attract women...

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the original crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: The World of the Married
programme.desc: Ji Sun-woo, a successful doctor, is married to Lee Tae-oh, an aspiring filmmaker. Their marriage, however, starts to fall apart when Lee engages in an extra-marital affair.
