programme.title: Kumusta Ka Hudas
programme.desc: Mario (Rudy Fernandez) and Fidel (Ace Vergel) are best of friends since childhood. But some dissidents set-up Mario and Fidel to look like they betrayed each other. Can the two friends find it in their heart to trust each other again?

programme.title: Kumander Bawang
programme.desc: Herbert Bautista comes from a family of vampire killers. The male heirs reek with the stench of garlic and are endowed with super powers. There is a need for Kumander Bawang and is off to fight the vampire.

programme.title: Nestor Solis (Hari ng Oxo)
programme.desc: Manila in the 1970's. Society was restless and violence was a way of life. Efren Reyes Jr. is Nestor Solis, a former boxer who was driven by difficult circumstances to a life of crime.

programme.title: Boy Chico Hulihin… Ben Tumbling
programme.desc: This is another look at the brief and violent life of 60's hoodlum Ben Tumbling. This version is from the point of view of Boy Chico, the dedicated cop who killed him.

programme.title: Sana'y Wala Nang Wakas (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three women united by friendship, music and fame. But much that celebrity brought them good things, it too, began to destroy them.

programme.title: Pre, Hanggang Sa Huli
programme.desc: Brandon is a hard-hitting cop on the trail of a drug syndicate. Cooper is a cop from a small barrio in the province. They were as different as night is from day, but they ended up as partners and very close friends.

programme.title: Wooly Booly 2 (Ang Titser Kong Alien)
programme.desc: The sequel to the succesful Wooly Booly, Ang Classmate Kong Alien. The story continues with Wooly Booly living happily on earth with his human girlfriend. One day, his girlfriend from his planet decides to visit earth with the aim of taking Wooly Booly back home.

programme.title: Strict Ang Peyrents Ko
programme.desc: Lynette was a beautiful young woman, whose parents, Marimar and Fulgoso, were unreasonably strict with her. They refused to allow her to meet men and those who venture to court her were instantly turned away.

programme.title: Reputasyon
programme.desc: What a nice schoolgirl like Miya Brown (Mia Nolasco) doing in a club as G.R.O.? She has learned that there is life beyond her mother's world and that of her father's.

programme.title: Ugat
programme.desc: It is World War II and Filipino guerilla leader Gabriel (Mario Escudero) is the Japanese soldiers' most wanted. He is cornered while visiting his family. Years later, nephew Carding (George Estregan) is all grown up and ready to avenge his father and sister's death.

programme.title: Nognog
programme.desc: Nognog

programme.title: Antipolo Massacre
programme.desc: Based on a true to life story of Cecilia Masagca Antipolo Massacre is one of the most vindictive and brutal films of 1994. Possessed by an evil spirit lurked into his soul, Winifredo (Cesar Montano) brought misery and affliction to his once happy and contented family life.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 10
programme.desc: The epic series finale. The Kents fight with everything they have as Luthor makes his final move on Smallville.

programme.title: Arrow S2 1
programme.desc: A LOOK BACK AT THE FIRST SEASON AND AN EXCLUSIVE LOOK AT SEASON TWO

programme.title: Arrow S2 2
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Diggle and Felicity travel to Lian Yu to convince Oliver to return home to Starling City, where he finds things much worse than he imagined.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 2
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys try to sell diamonds to unsuspecting couples ready to tie the knot, and pose as members of a very unwelcoming committee down at the boardwalk.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys share humiliating text messages in a quiet waiting room, shampoo women's hair at an upscale hair salon, and teach a driver's ed course that's a guaranteed fail.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys put their green thumbs to the test as workers in a garden center, demonstrate how NOT to save lives as CPR instructors, and they're full of baloney workinga deli counter.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 5
programme.desc: The guys go barking up the wrong tree at a pet store, take a swing as golf instructors, and give their regards to Broadway as producers in need of funding.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 6
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys raise money for absurd charities at a donut shop, join diners mid-meal in a Chinese restaurant, and offer unsolicited advice to shoppers in a mall.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 17
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 15
programme.desc: Which one of our hosts recently got rid of some bad ink? Who is Kevin a big fan of? (Hint: His dog shares the same name.) Which pop star once babysat Brooke? Get all of that and more on Inside Hacks.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Friends S6 9
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Chandler tries to gain favor with Monica's parents – but an old secret involving Ross causes problems. Undomestic Rachel's dessert proves intriguing.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: Friends S6 11
programme.desc: Janine forces Joey to choose between her and his friends. Rachel buys an apothecary table from a store that Phoebe abhors.

programme.title: Friends S6 12
programme.desc: Chandler is upset when a men's magazine prints Ross' cartoon; both Chandler and Ross claim to have originated the joke.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 20
programme.desc: Jessie hopes to find some hidden gems in a bin full of old furniture. Papa Bear goes fishing for profit. Brandon and Lori gamble big on a business in a box and a very special item from Sean.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 21
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip to Canyon Country to bid on huge trailers. A mysterious concrete block and a trailer full of hay mean big opportunities and lead to unusual alliances within the group.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 22
programme.desc: Lori and Brandon get in a fight over a bin and make a wager to see who can do better. Lori eyes a bin with a tanning bed, while a bin with fake walls intrigues Brandon. Meanwhile, Papa Bear and Jesse vie for a bin full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23
programme.desc: When Sean is only allowed in the storage facility after hours, it results in the first ever day to night auction, ending in the dark! Will their flashlights illuminate big scores?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 10
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes jealous and considers taking his relationship with Amy to the next level when Stuart (guest star KEVIN SUSSMAN) from the comic book store asks her out on a date.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 11
programme.desc: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor (guest star LANCE BARBER), while Penny realizes that she might have been a bully herself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 12
programme.desc: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy, and it's up to Penny to teach him how to be a better boyfriend. Howard, meanwhile, must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 11
programme.desc: Resurrecting an old coffin purchased from a dying store, John and Rat Boy make a grave decision and leave Jimmy six feet under.

programme.title: Guy Ritchie's The Covenant
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie’s The Covenant follows US Army Sergeant John Kinley and Afghan interpreter Ahmed. After an ambush, Ahmed goes to Herculean lengths to save Kinley’s life.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 5
programme.desc: Sheldon helps his roommate try to beat the stock market, Missy and Billy Sparks throw a party, and Mary finds a new church.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 6
programme.desc: Georgie and Mandy’s wedding plans pit Mary against Mandy’s mom, Audrey (Rachel Bay Jones), with baby CeeCee caught in the middle.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 13
programme.desc: Everything might change when Leonard offers Penny a spur of the moment invitation to a romantic dinner for two on the 100th episode of the series.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 14
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny experiment with dating again by "beta testing" their relationship, while Raj develops a peculiar relationship with his phone's virtual assistant.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 8
programme.desc: Mark rallies Flecha Azul's marketing team ahead of their big launch, shores up a deal to expand Wahlburgers.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 9
programme.desc: While screening his new film in Iowa, Mark gets caught in a tornado. Later, Mark is informed about a glitch on Municipal’s website during their women’s line launch.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 12
programme.desc: When Riggs visits his father-in-law (TONY PLANA) in prison, a walk down memory lane reveals an old secret about his deceased wife (FLORIANA LIMA).

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 13
programme.desc: Murtaugh and Riggs investigate the murder of an escaped patient of Dr. Cahill's who mysteriously goes off the rails, bringing to light a hidden scheme bigger than they imagined.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 14
programme.desc: When Detective Bailey's sister, Jess (ALISHA WAINWRIGHT), runs into trouble with the law, Bailey must decide how far she's willing to go to protect her family.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 15
programme.desc: While searching for the culprit of a local jewelry heist, Riggs deals with withdrawal from drinking and Murtaugh gets called grandpa by another parent on the playground.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 16
programme.desc: While Murtaugh walks on thin ice with Trish, Riggs finds an unlikely friend in Ruthie (SWOOSIE KURTZ) and Captain Avery is reunited with a college "frenemy" (WALLACE LANGHAM).

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 03
programme.desc: Our dynamic duo discovers how to hack vodka to taste like top shelf, explores the origin of gin and tonic with Hacks from History, and welcomes a tennis ball into the exclusive All Star club.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 04
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke host the ultimate Battle of the Bags by discovering the best hacks for carrying groceries. Plus, they welcome rubber gloves to the All Star Club and explore hacks from the original Hack Master: Benjamin Franklin.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6
programme.desc: Let the revelry begin as 20 of the most boneheaded partiers throw down. From twerking babes to an overzealous Willie Nelson fan and a drunken keg stand you can't un-see. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of comics, including Brendon Walsh, KevinMcCaffrey and Jaime Andrews

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 17
programme.desc: While investigating a construction site death, Riggs struggles to rekindle his relationship with Molly, Murtaugh tries to make it right at home, and Trish's job is on the line.
